short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some useful tools for competitive TF2 players.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin adds external ETF2L, RGL and ESEA Division data integration for the websites TF2Center and LogsTF. You will find this data displayed next to the users name on both sites.
